title: U.S. Bans Transactions With Russian Central Bank
itunes:title: U.S. Bans Transactions With Russian Central Bank
description:
Bloomberg News White House Reporter Jordan Fabian reports on the U.S. banning business with the Bank of Russia, the Russian National Wealth Fund and the Ministry of Finance. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Katherine Chiglinsky discusses news from Berkshire Hathaway and Warren Buffett's annual letter to shareholders. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Cross Asset Reporter Denitsa Tsekova share the details of Denitsa's Businessweek Magazine story Wall Street’s Risky ‘Razor Blade’ Trade Is Making a Comeback. Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director Andy Browne explains why China has a big Ukraine problem. And we Drive to the Close with Dan Pipitone, CEO at TradeZero America.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
